name: Asteroids (itch) (gregosefo)
description:
This game is an homage to Atari's Asteroids and plays very similar to it.

Have fun!

Original Asteroids audio was downloaded from http://www.classicgaming.cc/classics/asteroids/.

Font information was generated using AngelCode's Bitmap Font Generator (http://www.angelcode.com/products/bmfont/).

This application is written in C++ and developed for the 64-bit Windows OS. It uses Microsoft's D3D11 and XAudio2 APIs for graphics and audio, respectively.
